      • createAndShowGUI

        public static void createAndShowGUI()
        Create the GUI and show it. For thread safety, this method should be invoked from the event-dispatching thread.

      • startPrintThread

        private static void startPrintThread()
        Start the Print and Generation thread. This will keep looping intermetently until their respective JOB classes are filled with jobs question Jobs

      • openPrintTask

        public static void openPrintTask()
        Start the PrintTaskWindow but hide it. There are many access points to the PrintTaskWindow so we initialize keep it in the back the whole time

      • launchMain

        public static void launchMain()
        Launch the Main Window

      • exit

        public static void exit()
        Exit the application Make sure to close every printer connection and streams. If you dont close printer connection the driver connection will hang in the background and prevent any other instances to connect to the printer again

      • launchConfigurationWindow

        @Deprecated
public static void launchConfigurationWindow()
        Deprecated. It is better to use the configuration file question loadSettings() as it contains the newest configuration options
        Show the preferences window

      • openReprint

        public static void openReprint()
        Open to reprint window

      • loadSettings

        public static void loadSettings()
                         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Load our global configuration from the config.properties file. The config will be store in the Config files and can be accesses globally from any parts of the application
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
